UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design of Protegrin-1 Analogs with Improved Antibacterial Selectivity.
Literature.Author: Bolosov IA, Panteleev PV, Sychev SV, Khokhlova VA, Safronova VN, Toropygin IY, Kombarova TI, Korobova OV, Pereskokova ES, Borzilov AI, Ovchinnikova TV, Balandin SV

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:1.1±0.15% Hemolysis=64 µM,Human erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=>64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli BW25113(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=0.5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus 209P(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µM),Micrococcus luteus B-1314(MIC=4µM)
